page.title: 17Weymouth Squash Club.
page.content: { Weymouth Squash Club}is along {Newstead Road,}not far from Weymouth football ground. Myself and David both go to the{mini-club}which is for children over{nine years old.}When a player gets good enough, he or she graduates to a higher group. About 15- 20 other children also go to this Club. We have{lessons for 70p}every week. A lesson lasts one hour and twenty minutes. Apart from{Squash Courts}there is a {bar upstairs}with an{eating area.}In the bar area there is a pool table and an arcade game. Downstairs there are {showers and a Sauna.}There is a {powergym}for those who like to keep fit and{two sunbeds. David Birch,Jeffrey Tinsley.
